name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a dedicated Senior Field Engineer with 8 years of experience, I excel in problem-solving, IT diagnosis, and ensuring network connectivity in complex environments. My technical expertise in **Electro-engineering** and **Imaging Systems** allows me to deliver precise remote service and preventative maintenance solutions, ensuring operational excellence. I have a proven track record of providing exceptional customer service while strictly adhering to regulatory standards. 
In addition to my field engineering skills, I possess a full-stack development background, utilizing modern technologies such as **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**. My experience encompasses building high-performance applications with **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. I have also worked extensively with cloud services like **Azure** and **AWS**, and I am proficient in implementing microservices architecture and CI/CD automation practices. My strengths in developing machine learning pipelines and utilizing tools such as **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow** enhance my ability to innovate and drive efficient solutions.
